description.narrative: The Filipino public are more informed and equipped to engage Government to call for its commitment and action to eliminate all forms of violence against children, which contributes to Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2023, moreÂ children and adolescents, particularly the most vulnerable, benefitÂ from more effective, quality, gender-sensitive, preventive, and responsive child protection system, and live in communities that better protect children from violence.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The Filipino public are more informed and equipped to engage Government to call for its commitment and action to eliminate all forms of violence against children

description.narrative: Dialoguesat subnational and national levels to support the development and implementation of strategies for social change progressed well and key Communications for Development interventions were included in work plans. However, as the formulation of sub-national workplans commenced only during the second semester to ensure alignment with the government planning cycle, and delays in the recruitment of the C4D Specialist there were delays in the the execution of activities. In 2020, efforts will need to be accelerated to ensure that interventions directed at strengthening institutional capacities to prevent and respond to VAC will be complemented by sustained strategies for social change | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:07/02/2020
